reviewText: Shaw Brothers CollectionI just bough this collection set, I was so happy to watch them but I got disappointed because the language is not English. It is only in Chinese, it has subtitles, but who wants to read while your enjoying the movie.Good movies but wrong language.
Title: Shaw Brothers Collection

reviewText: Some of the movies in this set were better than others.  Forget about the plots, the stories, the background settings, they are absolutely terrible in that regard. But then the awful storylines and dialog are all just a vehicle for delivering some of the best choreographed martial arts combat scenes ever crafted. If you like excellently filmed and pefectly timed fight scenes, this set does not disappoint. Some of the fights are pure fantasy, impossible in the real world, but very entertaining to watch regardless.- Mike S.
Title: Shaw Brothers Collection

reviewText: In this package there were four movies. The best was the "Two Champions of Shaolin"! This made it all worth it! This was a classic SB Chop-Socky. Everything you want in a Kung-Fu flick! Strange weapons. Murder. Betrayal. Plots and sub plots. Out of sync voices. bad hair pieces. Lots of blood. Spraying spinal fluid! Wild ending mass fight scene! Shaw brothers at their best. Get this one. I won't mention the rest.I give it three stars on the strength of the above mentioned movie. You might like the rest, but I didn't.
summary: One out of four ain't bad!
Title: Shaw Brothers Collection

reviewText: Here are 4 more shaw brother's movies.  Pretty good, not great, but preety good.  Worth wacthing if your a shaw brothers fan.  The plot's are a little on the stange side.
Title: Shaw Brothers Collection

reviewText: This is not going to be a long review, but I did expect more movies.  I remember watching these kind of movies late at night or on saturday mornings so I think they are great dispite the budget of these type of films.  I dont think I will purchase Vol II of the Shaw Brothers collection.
Title: Shaw Brothers Collection

reviewText: This is another fabulus SHAW dvd box set with 4 great movies from the master himself. These 4 movies together with other SHAW classics like, THE 36TH CHAMPER OF SHAOLIN TRILOGY // IN THE SECRET SERVISE OF THE EMPEROR // THE MASTER aka THREE EVIL MASTERS and SHAOLIN TEMPLE (1976) are the best of the best. Buy those movies together with the other great 4 dvd movies SHAW box set and u have everything from SHAW BROTHERS worth buying.
Title: Shaw Brothers Collection
